summary: Diff adds build-time variant configuration (VITE_APP_VARIANT), per-variant env files, build scripts, and deployment docs; App routing is simplified to only '/' and '/success' while injecting the version-specific heading from config. However, a VersionSelectScreen still exists per the diff summary, which appears to implement an entry version-selection UI that was explicitly disallowed.

hallucinated_features.description: User-facing version selection entry screen (buttons to navigate to Version 1 vs Version 2).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest REQ-12 explicitly requires removing the single-app “version selection” entry flow; keeping/adding an entry screen that selects versions is outside the request and conflicts with the acceptance criteria and non-goals.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("Entry screen displaying two buttons that navigate to Version 1 or Version 2")
